review_text: well i'm not impressed because all it is,is a mini food processor, nothing spectacular as they all work the same. I did like the fact that I could get it in a different color which was blue. I thought I would use it more but I have only used it a couple of times. I still like my bigger food processor and feel I may have wasted my money buying it. it probably would be great for an older person who doesn't need the big food processor and only needs to chop up small stuff.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
